com.xith3d.scenegraph
Class Appearance

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.scenegraph.SceneGraphObject
      com.xith3d.scenegraph.NodeComponent
          com.xith3d.scenegraph.Appearance
public class Appearance
extends NodeComponent

Appearance is a component object of a Shape3D node that defines all rendering state attributes for that shape node.
